overview: Set in a beautiful villa in the woodlands of Colorado, college girl sorority group ‘Taf Kavla Epsilon’ have a lot of new candidates who want to join their sorority club. So Britney, the head of the college girls gets together with Jason, head of the college guys, organize a secret sex ambush on the girls to help them audition the sorority’s new members. Watch as the new applicants will do whatever it takes to make the grade.
title: College Girls vs College Guys
